property.name: type
property.label: Type
property.description: No div will not wrap the slots in a div, so neither CSS classes nor ids will be applied.

property.name: id
property.label: Id
property.description: Id to be set on this element, leave empty to drop the id. Make sure it's unique across the page.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: CSS classes to be applied to the div.

property.name: item1ClassName
property.label: Item 1 class name
property.description: CSS classes to be applied to the 1st child div.

property.name: item1Id
property.label: Item 1 id
property.description: Id to be set on 1st child div, leave empty to drop the id. Make sure it's unique across the page.

property.name: item2ClassName
property.label: Item 2 class name
property.description: CSS classes to be applied to the 2nd child div.

property.name: item2Id
property.label: Item 2 id
property.description: Id to be set on 2nd child div, leave empty to drop the id. Make sure it's unique across the page.
